original_title: Bad Boy Bill: Behind the Decks
overview: This collection of work from renowned Chicago DJ Bad Boy Bill acts as a blistering visual sidekick to his "Behind the Decks" album, combining live clips, music videos and behind-the-scenes footage. Tracks include "Freaks Like Us" by Jay J and Chris Lum, "The Talk" by Harrison Crump, "Don't Stop" by the Dukes of Sluca, "Beat Freaker" by Steve Smooth, "Hypnotizing" by Kid Cr√®me, "Esamba" by Junior Jack and "Movin' Out" by Warren Clarke.
title: Bad Boy Bill: Behind the Decks
